mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.record_id AS "recordId", a.equipment_id AS "equipmentId", a.equip_sn AS "equipSn", a.door_pos AS "doorPos", a.staff_id AS "staffId", staff.name AS "staff.name", a.finger_id AS "fingerInfoId", finger.finger_num AS "fingerInfo.fingerNum", a.event_date AS "eventDate", ed.author_type as "authorType", ed.id as "eventDetailId", a.access_status AS "accessStatus", a.event_type as eventType, a.handle_status as handleStatus, a.handle_time as "handleTime", a.handle_user_name_id as "handleUserNameId", suser.name AS "handleUser.name", a.handle_mode as "handleMode", b.name as "officeName", a.remark as "remarks"

LEFT JOIN guard_equipment teq on teq.id = a.equipment_id LEFT JOIN sys_office b ON b.id = teq.office_id LEFT JOIN guard_staff staff on staff.id=a.staff_id LEFT JOIN guard_finger_info finger on finger.staff_id=staff.id LEFT JOIN sys_user suser on suser.id = a.handle_user_name_id LEFT JOIN tbmj_event_detail ed on ed.record_id=a.record_id and ed.equipment_id=a.equipment_id and ed.person_id=a.staff_id
